\hline

    &  \\
  \hline

\end{table}
mix:
\begin{itemize}
\item 1 times volume of 0.3 \% (w/v) p-nitrophenyl palmitate in isopropanol;
\item 9 times volume of 0.2 \% (w/v) sodium deoxycholate and 0.1 \% (w/v) gum arabicum in 50 mM Phosphate buffer pH 8;
\end{itemize}
